Comment: IMHO you want Mayhew’s *The Electoral Connection*. It’s not a day-to-day mechanics of what congress does, but it’s the seminal work in understanding *How congress actually works*. What are the constraints and incentives faced by your lawmakers? Who seeks re-election and why? What can actually get done and what can’t?   If you could only read one book about congress, it should be this one.
